overview: Enjoy the latest scorching addition to the classic "Splash Shots" series from Falcon, featuring the return of classic Falcon man Jim Bentley, star of the first episode in the "Splash Shots"! Steam up the season with twelve of the hottest stars in an erotic extravaganza sure to stretch your speedos! Don't miss Falcon Exclusives Roland Dane, Justin Dragon, Josh Weston, Tommy Brant and Josh Harting in addition to seven other sultry studs who know how to keep you hot and dripping no matter what the weather outside!
title: Splash Shots 3: To the Hilt
